lines.text: I should be in the American flag business. Cigarettes turn me blue, whiskey turns me red, and women turn me white.
I just love banana splits. Is it all the wonderful mixed-up flavors, or is it something Freudian?
You've GOT to get a haircut. And if you have to let the barber give you Novocaine, let 'em!
Actors don't have mothers. They're the only people on earth who give birth to themselves.
No one calls him Captain. He's Dick to everyone.
